body.p: ive managed to brush off a few ordeals and ive taken a good chunk of time to better my mental health. had a long beautiful conversation with a good friend of mine and i feel much better about the outcome of everything ive dealt with
i also spent some time setting up things on my phone and car so i can call with friends or listen to music on a drive :oD
im also taking some time to learn java so i can write cool databases and backends when i eventually get into that :⌉
also also, ive begun publishing parts of pair purgatory!! \( ^ω^ )/
please check out at least the first episode so far, and also feel free to check out the source to see stuff like the ideas i have for it!

its been a story project on my mind for YEARS and im only now managing to write everything!! eventually, when i finish the first episode, ill turn it into a roblox studio comic thing, which has been my plan since like 2019
